name: 0xx The Red
description:
Welcome to "0xx The Red".  You are in this dark place. Now you have to adapt here and get ready for various unexplainable things. 

Creating various geometric shapes/models. Portal leading to nowhere. The computer is one of the main tools. A creature with eyes, he watches the player's actions. And some other unfinished moments.

In developing: 

 * story mode
 * gun editor
 * making tools
 * game site
 * random events
 * microscope
 * other world
